long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wanted to browse your favorite meme / news / cute pics subreddit, but kept getting annoyed at how long it took to type out the whole URL (AND maybe make typos!)?

Reddit Redirector is a simple chrome extension that solves that problem. Simply type 'r' into your search bar, and then follow it up with a [TAB]. Then, type in your favorite subreddit to go to.

This extension even keeps a tab of the most visited subreddits, so you can speed up the process even more!

This will work no matter what site you are currently on.
Interested in the source code? You'll find it at https://github.com/joshdabosh/reddit-redirector, where you can also submit Pull Requests / Issues.
